description: This file defines a Java class named CategoriesPagerAdapter that extends FragmentStateAdapter. It implements a pager adapter to manage fragments corresponding to different categories ('All', 'Work', 'Personal') in an Android app, creating instances of CategoryNotesFragment based on position.

classes.name: CategoriesPagerAdapter
classes.description: An adapter for supplying fragments to a ViewPager2 component, managing different category views.

methods.name: CategoriesPagerAdapter
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the adapter with a Fragment.

methods.name: createFragment
methods.description: Creates and returns a new fragment instance for a given category position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of categories managed by the adapter.
